segments.text: I'm glad we took the train . I don't like to ride in buses .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I agree . We can see the scenery better . In a bus , all you see are the roads .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Even in Taiwan , I always liked to take the train . It is more comfortable .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I agree . Buses bounce too much . After two or three hours , you feel too tired .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you think I can take a picture through this window ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't know if it will turn out good.The window might cause the picture to be blurry .
segments.speaker: S2
